description: From the Taylor Lake TH of Highway 1 west of Banff follow the well marked trail to the east end of Taylor Lake. From here you can continue to the right up towards Panorama Meadow.Some section of the trail above Taylor Lake can be wet and slippery.
directions: From Banff take highway 1 west to the Taylor Lake exit on the left. Parking is plentiful most days.
title: TAYLOR LAKE - PANORAMA MEADOW
